title: Data Entry Assistant (100% Remote)
descriptionHtml:
Exciting Career Opportunity - Join Our Team!

We are looking for dedicated and motivated individuals to join our team and contribute to our continued success. This position offers a chance to grow professionally in a supportive and inclusive environment, with flexibility and long-term career potential.

Employment Type: Full-Time / Part-Time

Salary Range: $35-40/hr

Job Summary:

The ideal candidate will perform a range of tasks to support daily operations, contribute to team goals, and uphold our standards of excellence. This role requires a proactive attitude, a willingness to learn, and a commitment to quality and professionalism.

Key Responsibilities:


  • Support day-to-day operations and team functions
  • Maintain accuracy and attention to detail in assigned tasks
  • Communicate effectively with team members and clients
  • Adhere to company policies, procedures, and deadlines
  • Take initiative and show flexibility in handling tasks
  • Contribute to a positive and respectful work culture




Qualifications:


  • High school diploma or equivalent (college degree a plus)
  • Basic computer and communication skills
  • Strong organizational and time management abilities
  • Ability to work independently or as part of a team
  • Adaptable and willing to learn new tools or systems
  • Reliable and responsible work ethic




Benefits:


  • Competitive salary with opportunities for increases
  • Flexible work hours and remote options (if applicable)
  • Opportunities for career growth and advancement
  • Ongoing training and development
  • Health, dental, and vision insurance (if applicable)
  • Paid time off and holiday benefits
  • Employee support programs and recognition




Take the next step in your career and apply today. We are excited to learn more about you!

industries: Executive Search Services
companyDescription:
Altın Post Giresun Adası Gezi Teknesi

National Geographic’in kapak yaptığı, BBC’nin belgeselini çektiği, bir çok filme konu olan Yunan mitolojisinin en önemli karakteri Herkül’ün altın postu aradığı Giresun Adası tekne turları düzenliyoruz.

Düzenli seferlerimiz saat 10:00'da başlayıp her 2 saatte 1 düzenlenmektedir. Hava şartları elverdiğince haftanın her günü seferlerimizi 10:00 / 20:00 aralığında gerçekleşmektedir.

title: Search Engine Optimisation Consultant
descriptionHtml:
Experienced SEO specialists skilled at auditing, optimising, and growing organic search presence for enterprise, ecommerce, sports, and finance brands invited to take the next step in your career with a fast-growing, well-respected, and ground-breaking agency.

Job Description

You will work on all aspects of SEO from on-page content optimisation to digital PR, and keep up with new SEO tools and techniques to grow traffic, sales and inbound lead volumes. Job duties will include:

  • SEO strategy definition
  • Technical on page audits – analysis, recommendations and implementations
  • Auditing website copy and suggesting optimisations
  • Occasionally writing copy for service pages and blogs / news content
  • Keeping abreast of SEO trends and algorithm updates
  • Analysing data and performing effective keyword and competitor research
  • Writing interesting articles, to be used on the agency website
  • Representing the agency at industry events
  • Building relationships with industry press, bloggers and news sites to promote our brand, our research, and our content to industry influencers and publications

You will join a small team, and be expected to hit the ground running. You should be savvy when it comes to understanding HTML and CSS, ideally with some programming knowledge (e.g. PHP, XML and JSON feeds) and JavaScript frameworks, as well as advanced tools and technology for large-scale website optimisation.

The position opens up a lot of opportunities to improve your knowledge of Google Search, Map Search, Shopping Search, News Search and video content optimisation.

The contract will include a 3 month probation period.

Job Outcomes

  • Provide technical and marketing SEO consulting
  • Training client in-house marketing & PR teams
  • Grow client organic search traffic by 20% per year
  • Reach client KPI targets (traffic, keyword rankings, SERP presence)
  • Maintain 95% client retention rate
  • Represent AccuraCast at important SEO conferences.

Apply now

Requirements

  • Native-level fluency of English (copy writing skills will be tested)
  • 2+ years experience working on SEO for enterprise and/or ecommerce
  • On-page and off-page SEO experience
  • Thorough understanding HTML and CSS
  • Good level of programming knowledge (e.g. PHP or Python)
  • Very comfortable creating & reviewing XML and JSON feeds
  • Bachelor’s degree
  • Extreme attention to detail

Additional Qualifications (Preferred)

  • Ability to speak a Western / Northern European language (especially German)
  • Candidates with a Marketing / Journalism degree
  • Experience using Google Analytics, Data Studio, Screaming Frog & SEMRush.

We Offer

Job title: Search Engine Optimisation Consultant Locality: Remote (WFH) Region: UK Country: United Kingdom Job type: Full time Hours: 40 hours per week Base salary: £25¬,000 – £60,000 / year Benefits: Private medical insurance, private pension, mental health cover, 28 days annual leave, cycle scheme, flexible working

View More Opportunities

industries: Advertising Services
companyDescription:
Accuracast is an international digital marketing agency that works with ambitious brands to accelerate growth through data and technology.

Whether you'd like to scale internationally, or consolidate multi-national marketing operations, we can create solutions that positively impact your digital marketing campaigns.

As an international digital marketing agency, we specialise in Paid Search & Display Advertising (PPC), Generative AI Engine Optimisation (GEO), Search Engine Optimisation (SEO) and Social Media Marketing for ambitious brands.

Offices in London, New York and Madrid. 

Clients include PwC, Penguin Random House, WTW, Club Med, Informa, China Mobile and Hard Rock Hotels.

industries: Executive Search Services
companyDescription:
Altın Post Giresun Adası Gezi Teknesi

National Geographic’in kapak yaptığı, BBC’nin belgeselini çektiği, bir çok filme konu olan Yunan mitolojisinin en önemli karakteri Herkül’ün altın postu aradığı Giresun Adası tekne turları düzenliyoruz.

Düzenli seferlerimiz saat 10:00'da başlayıp her 2 saatte 1 düzenlenmektedir. Hava şartları elverdiğince haftanın her günü seferlerimizi 10:00 / 20:00 aralığında gerçekleşmektedir.

We are looking for dedicated and motivated individuals to join our team and contribute to our continued success. This position offers a chance to grow professionally in a supportive and inclusive environment, with flexibility and long-term career potential.

Salary Range: $35-40/hr., Competitive, based on experience and qualifications

The ideal candidate will perform a range of tasks to support daily operations, contribute to team goals, and uphold our standards of excellence. This role requires a proactive attitude, a willingness to learn, and a commitment to quality and professionalism.

  • Support day-to-day operations and team functions
  • Maintain accuracy and attention to detail in assigned tasks
  • Communicate effectively with team members and clients
  • Adhere to company policies, procedures, and deadlines
  • Take initiative and show flexibility in handling tasks
  • Contribute to a positive and respectful work culture

  • Basic computer and communication skills
  • Strong organizational and time management abilities
  • Ability to work independently or as part of a team
  • Adaptable and willing to learn new tools or systems

Benefits

  • Competitive salary with opportunities for increases
  • Flexible work hours and remote options (if applicable)
  • Opportunities for career growth and advancement
  • Ongoing training and development
  • Health, dental, and vision insurance (if applicable)
  • Paid time off and holiday benefits
  • Employee support programs and recognition

Take the next step in your career and apply today. We are excited to learn more about you!

companyDescription:
Altın Post Giresun Adası Gezi Teknesi

National Geographic’in kapak yaptığı, BBC’nin belgeselini çektiği, bir çok filme konu olan Yunan mitolojisinin en önemli karakteri Herkül’ün altın postu aradığı Giresun Adası tekne turları düzenliyoruz.

Düzenli seferlerimiz saat 10:00'da başlayıp her 2 saatte 1 düzenlenmektedir. Hava şartları elverdiğince haftanın her günü seferlerimizi 10:00 / 20:00 aralığında gerçekleşmektedir.

companyAddress.streetAddress: P.I. "EL PRADO"​, C/ LOGROÑO, PARCELAS 28-32, NAVE 24

companyDescription:
ductoLux, es una empresa de Ingeniería de Proyectos, ubicada en el Polígono Industrial “El Prado” de Mérida (Badajoz), España.
En los últimos años, ductoLux, viene participando como contratista en grandes instalaciones de generación de energía, realizando desde la ingeniería, instalaciones, construcción y legalización de las Plantas.
A su vez ha participado en distintas obras para  diversas empresas de diversos sectores, realizándoles proyectos de llave en mano, potenciando sus conocimientos técnicos con el fin de proporcional al cliente un servicio integral.
En la actualidad, ductoLux, está en una estrategia de desarrollo junto con las grandes firmas con las que ha venido trabajando, para realizar una expansión nacional e internacional.
 ductoLux, tiene ocho familias de servicios, las cuales se detallan a continuación:
•	001 Oficina Técnica
•	002 Consultoría Técnica.
•	003 Construcción.
•	004 Instalaciones Eléctricas.
•	005 Instalaciones de Climatización.
•	006 Otras Instalaciones.
•	007 Mantenimiento.
ductoLux, ofrece al cliente un servicio integral de cada una de sus familias, poniendo todos los elementos de la empresa a su disposición, desde la concepción de la idea, durante su maduración, ejecución y posterior funcionamiento. Nos diferenciamos de la competencia, en que nos tomamos el proyecto del cliente como si fueran nuestro.
ductoLux, ofrece al cliente un asesoramiento técnico en la idea del cliente, diseña y proyecta la maduración de la idea y hace un seguimiento del trabajo una vez acabado, estando en contacto continuo con el cliente y a su disposición.

title: Social Media Assistant
descriptionHtml:
At CONNETIX, we're not just a toy company; we're innovators on a mission to inspire learning through creativity and imagination with our award-winning, open-ended STEAM-accredited magnetic tiles. As we continue to rapidly expand globally, we're looking for a passionate Social Media Assistant to join our family-oriented team, based in North America.


A few of the standout things we offer:



  • Remote Work Flexibility: Enjoy the freedom of a remote work setup that helps you balance your professional and personal life.
  • Collaborative Culture: Be part of a supportive team that embraces collaboration and creativity. We encourage everyone to share their unique perspectives.
  • Award-Winning Workplace: Proudly awarded the 'Great Place to Work’ accolade for four consecutive years, reflecting our commitment to a positive and inclusive culture.


About the Role


As a Social Media Assistant, you'll help us create and share exciting content across various platforms. You'll assist with managing social media platforms and supporting our strategies to boost our online presence. You'll have the opportunity to help grow our reach and engagement on Instagram, Facebook, TikTok, Pinterest, and YouTube.


Drawing on your toolkit of experience, here is what you will be doing:



  • Learn and apply best practices for social media channels, staying updated on trends and new tools.
  • Assist the wider Social Media team, in developing social media strategies that align with our brand and goals.
  • Create on-brand content across various social media platforms, including writing and editing posts and promoting campaigns.
  • Proactively boost engagement through targeted strategies.
  • Communicate with customers engaging on our social platforms in a timely manner.
  • Develop and manage influencer relationships and campaign groups.
  • Analyze post-performance and use data to inform future strategies.
  • Attend team meetings and contribute insights and ideas.
  • Assist the Social Media Marketing Manager with marketing campaigns and other related duties.


About You:



  • Collaborative Spirit: Excellent communication skills and a team-oriented mindset to bring ideas to life together.
  • Self-Starter: Ability to work autonomously, demonstrating initiative, independence, and proactive problem-solving skills.
  • Creative and Analytical: Good understanding of social media management and strategy, with a willingness to learn best practices. Strong interest in developing analytical skills and copywriting abilities.
  • Tech-Savvy: Experience with social media scheduling/analytics tools, and knowledge of photo and video editing programs.
  • Flexible Thinker: Effective time management and multitasking skills with the ability to prioritize tasks efficiently.



Further to that, our ideal candidate will have:



  • Prior experience in managing social media and community management.
  • Strong knowledge of social media platforms including Facebook, Instagram, Pinterest, YouTube, TikTok, and more.
  • Demonstrated track record of successful social media campaigns and audience engagement.
  • Creative skills and the ability to adapt brand tone of voice.
  • Strong communication and presentation skills.



Join us at a pivotal time as we continue to expand our reach in the toy industry. You'll have the opportunity to grow alongside a forward-thinking company dedicated to making a positive impact on learning through creativity. If this sounds like the perfect fit for you, apply now!

industries: Retail
companySlogan: CONNETIX is an Australian company passionate about producing open-ended toys for kids and kids at heart!
companyDescription:
With a mission to champion learning through play, CONNETIX brings to market award-winning, STEAM and MESH accredited magnetic tiles designed to spark imaginations and inspire children to learn and develop - all through open-ended play! 

At the heart of our brand is a passionate team of educators and industry experts driving the CONNETIX difference. We are committed to creating high-quality toys, striving for business excellence, and connecting with parents, educators and allied health professionals around the world to spread the value of open-ended play. See our inspired play community on Instagram @connetix_tiles and join in the fun! 

We are proud to be an Australian-owned construction toy brand, leading with purpose and a strong focus on building relationships. Our innovative range is stocked in quality retailers across the globe and trusted by families all over the world. 

Operating a family-focused, work-from-home business with a diverse and multinational team, CONNETIX inspires a positive workplace culture of collaboration, trust and inclusion – where every team member is valued and united through the power of play.  

CONNETIX is recognised as a Great Place to Work™ and was a 2024 National Finalist in the Telstra Best of Business Awards for Outstanding Growth and State Finalist for Embracing Innovation category.

companyDescription:
Altın Post Giresun Adası Gezi Teknesi

National Geographic’in kapak yaptığı, BBC’nin belgeselini çektiği, bir çok filme konu olan Yunan mitolojisinin en önemli karakteri Herkül’ün altın postu aradığı Giresun Adası tekne turları düzenliyoruz.

Düzenli seferlerimiz saat 10:00'da başlayıp her 2 saatte 1 düzenlenmektedir. Hava şartları elverdiğince haftanın her günü seferlerimizi 10:00 / 20:00 aralığında gerçekleşmektedir.

title: Digital Marketing & SEO Specialist
descriptionHtml:
Part-Time Remote Position

Position Overview

We are seeking a motivated and experienced Digital Marketing & SEO Specialist who is passionate about building businesses through ROI driven digital strategies and paid media to join our growing team part-time, remotely.

The primary focus of this role will be two-fold;

  • Manage current clients and assist in growing the digital marketing department at our agency and,
  • Oversee and manage our internal marketing efforts, as well as, help build our own digital presence.

The ideal candidate will possess strong skills pertaining to Google Ads and Facebook Ads with the drive to become a holistic digital marketing specialist that is able to work in multiple ad platforms and mediums based on individual client needs. The ideal candidate can manage digital marketing campaigns from discovery to implementation, management, tracking key insights, and reporting on success.

The Responsibilities

  • Work collaboratively with our highly skilled design, development and programming team
  • Execute our internal digital marketing initiatives
  • Increase lead flow and quality prospect interactions
  • Effectively strategize and manage a small book of digital marketing clients
  • Conduct new client discovery sessions with team support in order to devise effective digital marketing campaigns
  • Effectively manage client project management communications and reporting
  • Strategize, give creative direction, build, and manage paid media campaigns
  • Manage, update & troubleshoot in-market campaigns on an on-going basis
  • Devise and collaborate on lead nurturing activities such as email automation, drip campaigns, retargeting, etc.
  • Implement content updates to create effective, cohesive marketing language throughout the entire lead/purchase flow
  • Stay up-to-date on the latest trends and best practices in digital marketing
  • Adhere to project hours & scope requirements, timelines, and tracking of all time appropriately
  • Are up-to-date on the latest and new Digital Marketing and SEO methods, technologies, best practices and trends

Experience / Qualifications / Ability

  • Experience managing paid media campaigns such as Facebook, Google, & Bing ads
  • Experience utilizing and customizing Google Analytics / Google Data Studio (*plus)
  • Experience building lead gen programs including gated inbound assets and other technical strategies
  • Experience using platforms such as SEMrush, Mangools, etc.
  • Experience generating e-commerce revenue through digital advertising
  • Experience building multi-channel retargeting campaigns
  • Ability to align project KPI’s with reporting & custom tracking metrics
  • Lead gen and e-commerce experience combined (*plus)
  • Experience managing small teams (**plus)
  • Ability to flourish with minimal guidance, be proactive, handle uncertainty, and work well with clients and a multi-talented crew
  • 3+ years of recent, in-campaign experience managing paid media (paid social, search, display, etc)
  • Agency experience is a plus but not required

The Requirements

  • Full understanding of the digital marketing industry
  • Ability to teach, tailor, take control during client & executive interactions
  • Aren’t afraid to talk about money or ask difficult questions
  • Strong 2-way communication skills
  • Ability to meet deadlines and manage project timelines
  • Ability to effectively manage client communications in a professional and timely manner
  • Highly motivated, self-learner that can adapt to the rapidly changing ad platforms
  • Understands marketing principles and can create a fluid digital strategy from conception to ad delivery and on-going iterations
  • Understands and can speak to all digital marketing metrics
  • Understands tracking, pixels, and audience building
  • Understands and can devise data-driven advertising strategies
  • Display the highest level of professionalism at all times
  • Have a positive impact on culture and team morale

descriptionText: Part-Time Remote PositionPosition OverviewWe are seeking a motivated and experienced Digital Marketing & SEO Specialist who is passionate about building businesses through ROI driven digital strategies and paid media to join our growing team part-time, remotely.The primary focus of this role will be two-fold; Manage current clients and assist in growing the digital marketing department at our agency and, Oversee and manage our internal marketing efforts, as well as, help build our own digital presence.The ideal candidate will possess strong skills pertaining to Google Ads and Facebook Ads with the drive to become a holistic digital marketing specialist that is able to work in multiple ad platforms and mediums based on individual client needs. The ideal candidate can manage digital marketing campaigns from discovery to implementation, management, tracking key insights, and reporting on success.The Responsibilities Work collaboratively with our highly skilled design, development and programming team Execute our internal digital marketing initiatives Increase lead flow and quality prospect interactions Effectively strategize and manage a small book of digital marketing clients Conduct new client discovery sessions with team support in order to devise effective digital marketing campaigns Effectively manage client project management communications and reporting Strategize, give creative direction, build, and manage paid media campaigns Manage, update & troubleshoot in-market campaigns on an on-going basis Devise and collaborate on lead nurturing activities such as email automation, drip campaigns, retargeting, etc. Implement content updates to create effective, cohesive marketing language throughout the entire lead/purchase flow Stay up-to-date on the latest trends and best practices in digital marketing Adhere to project hours & scope requirements, timelines, and tracking of all time appropriately Are up-to-date on the latest and new Digital Marketing and SEO methods, technologies, best practices and trendsExperience / Qualifications / Ability Experience managing paid media campaigns such as Facebook, Google, & Bing ads Experience utilizing and customizing Google Analytics / Google Data Studio (*plus) Experience building lead gen programs including gated inbound assets and other technical strategies Experience using platforms such as SEMrush, Mangools, etc. Experience generating e-commerce revenue through digital advertising Experience building multi-channel retargeting campaigns Ability to align project KPI’s with reporting & custom tracking metrics Lead gen and e-commerce experience combined (*plus) Experience managing small teams (**plus) Ability to flourish with minimal guidance, be proactive, handle uncertainty, and work well with clients and a multi-talented crew 3+ years of recent, in-campaign experience managing paid media (paid social, search, display, etc) Agency experience is a plus but not requiredThe Requirements Full understanding of the digital marketing industry Ability to teach, tailor, take control during client & executive interactions Aren’t afraid to talk about money or ask difficult questions Strong 2-way communication skills Ability to meet deadlines and manage project timelines Ability to effectively manage client communications in a professional and timely manner Highly motivated, self-learner that can adapt to the rapidly changing ad platforms Understands marketing principles and can create a fluid digital strategy from conception to ad delivery and on-going iterations Understands and can speak to all digital marketing metrics Understands tracking, pixels, and audience building Understands and can devise data-driven advertising strategies Display the highest level of professionalism at all times Have a positive impact on culture and team morale Have a positive attitude and encourage growth and success Multitasking & time management skills a must Highly organized with attention-to-detail and consistency Ability to be a self-starter & self-motivated with a strong work ethic Excellent written and verbal communication skills Willingness to learn and improve skills Ability to analyze and propose solutions to problems Working from home and independently. You must be self-managed and self-motivated Able to communication through Slack and Google Meet MUST be located in the US Available Monday – Friday during business hours to attend to client needsApply companySlogan: Web Design & Development Company in Los Angeles, CA | UI/UX Design, Web Design, Product Design, & Web Development
companyDescription:
Black Flag Creative is a web design and development company anchored in Los Angeles, California.

We specialize in UI/UX design, web design, product design, responsive web design, custom web design, design systems, web development, mobile app development, WordPress CMS, Microsoft SharePoint, Shopify, branding design, and website maintenance and support.

We're passionate about partnering with growing startups, small businesses, and large organizations to create award-winning digital product experiences.

title: Part-Time Work From Home Data Entry Assistant
descriptionHtml:
Exciting Career Opportunity - Join Our Team!

We are looking for dedicated and motivated individuals to join our team and contribute to our continued success. This position offers a chance to grow professionally in a supportive and inclusive environment, with flexibility and long-term career potential.

Employment Type: Full-Time / Part-Time

Salary Range: $35-40/hr

Job Summary:

The ideal candidate will perform a range of tasks to support daily operations, contribute to team goals, and uphold our standards of excellence. This role requires a proactive attitude, a willingness to learn, and a commitment to quality and professionalism.

Key Responsibilities:


  • Support day-to-day operations and team functions
  • Maintain accuracy and attention to detail in assigned tasks
  • Communicate effectively with team members and clients
  • Adhere to company policies, procedures, and deadlines
  • Take initiative and show flexibility in handling tasks
  • Contribute to a positive and respectful work culture




Qualifications:


  • High school diploma or equivalent (college degree a plus)
  • Basic computer and communication skills
  • Strong organizational and time management abilities
  • Ability to work independently or as part of a team
  • Adaptable and willing to learn new tools or systems
  • Reliable and responsible work ethic




Benefits:


  • Competitive salary with opportunities for increases
  • Flexible work hours and remote options (if applicable)
  • Opportunities for career growth and advancement
  • Ongoing training and development
  • Health, dental, and vision insurance (if applicable)
  • Paid time off and holiday benefits
  • Employee support programs and recognition




Take the next step in your career and apply today. We are excited to learn more about you!

companyDescription: 2000 yılından bu yana, fikirleri teknolojiyle buluşturan EMU BİLİŞİM ailesi olarak kabuğumuzu sonunda çatlattık ve 2017 yılının başında dijital dünyaya ilk adımlarımızı Rüzgar Dijital Reklam Ajansı olarak atma kararı aldık. companySlogan: Porque eres ÚNICO y tu forma de aprender también
companyDescription:
Eres único. Tu forma de aprender también.

En ES-PAT nos tomamos la educación muy en serio: nos gusta pensar que no somos un servicio más de profesores particulares. Creemos que cada persona es única, y que su forma de aprender también lo es. Por eso ofrecemos un servicio de educación particular hecho para ti.

Mantener la cercanía nos permite ofrecerte un servicio de confianza, combinado a la perfección con una absoluta seriedad en nuestros métodos y resultados. Te ofrecemos asesoramiento personalizado desde el primer momento y durante todo el tiempo que dure tu relación con ES-PAT.

Nuestros objetivos:
- Ofrecer una atención diferenciada adaptada a cada persona.
- Conseguir el aprendizaje a través de la motivación, no del estudio.
- Potenciar las habilidades de cada alumno y desarrollar sus áreas de mejora.
- Educar personas únicas y responsables.

El alumno está siempre en el centro de toda nuestra metodología.

Nuestros valores: 
- Confianza
- Cercanía
- Transparencia
- Integridad
- Excelencia

Nuestro sueño: que ES-PAT se convierta en un referente educativo, tanto del aprendizaje de español como de la enseñanza particular en general.

Nuestras líneas de negocio son:
- Enseñanza de español para extranjeros, profesionales expatriados y sus familias.
- Clases particulares de cualquier materia para niños, jóvenes y adultos.

title: PowerPoint Formatting Expert
descriptionHtml:
PowerPoint Formatting Expert [$55/hr]


As referral partner, we are posting for experienced PowerPoint formatting specialists to support an ongoing professional presentation project with a fast-moving organization. This opportunity is ideal for individuals who excel at visual consistency, slide cleanup, and detail-oriented formatting. Freelancers will be responsible for elevating slide design strictly through layout and formatting—no content creation is required. This is a formatting-only engagement ideal for those with high availability.


Key Responsibilities

  • Clean and standardize PowerPoint decks to ensure visual polish and consistency
  • Apply consistent slide layouts, font treatments, and spacing
  • Format tables, charts, and graphics to align with provided templates or style guides
  • Troubleshoot formatting issues across complex or multi-author decks
  • Implement feedback quickly and accurately across multiple versions


Ideal Qualifications

  • Demonstrated expertise in PowerPoint formatting across professional or corporate decks
  • 2+ years of experience working on high-volume or deadline-driven presentation formatting projects
  • Strong eye for detail and visual alignment
  • Comfortable with repetitive, formatting-focused work
  • Ability to follow specific style guides and formatting instructions precisely


More About the Opportunity

  • Expected availability: 30+ hours/week required
  • Remote and asynchronous — set your own schedule
  • No content creation required — strictly formatting cleanup


Application Process

  • Submit your resume to get started
  • Qualified applicants may be asked to complete a brief formatting sample
  • Follow up within a few days with next steps

companySlogan: Great Talent. Great Value. Great Hiring.
companyDescription:
We started "Great Value Hiring" with a simple idea: to make meaningful connections. In a world of job boards and automated systems, we wanted to build a business that puts people first.

We are a talent solutions company passionate about bringing together great companies and exceptional individuals. We believe that the right job can transform a person's life and that the right hire can transform a business. Our focus is on creating win-win scenarios where both companies and candidates can achieve their full potential.
We're not limited to a single industry or type of role. Our broad focus allows us to serve a diverse range of clients and candidates, from entry-level positions to executive roles. Our goal is simple: to make the hiring process as efficient and effective as possible.

For us, it's not just about a single placement. It's about building long-term relationships and fostering a community where companies can grow and job seekers can find their calling. We're excited to be your partner on this journey.

descriptionHtml:
• Exciting Career Opportunity - Join Our Team!

We are looking for dedicated and motivated individuals to join our team and contribute to our continued success. This position offers a chance to grow professionally in a supportive and inclusive environment, with flexibility and long-term career potential.

Employment Type: Full-Time / Part-Time

Salary Range: $35-40/hr., Competitive, based on experience and qualifications

Job Summary

The ideal candidate will perform a range of tasks to support daily operations, contribute to team goals, and uphold our standards of excellence. This role requires a proactive attitude, a willingness to learn, and a commitment to quality and professionalism.

  • Support day-to-day operations and team functions
  • Maintain accuracy and attention to detail in assigned tasks
  • Communicate effectively with team members and clients
  • Adhere to company policies, procedures, and deadlines
  • Take initiative and show flexibility in handling tasks
  • Contribute to a positive and respectful work culture

Qualifications

  • High school diploma or equivalent (college degree a plus)
  • Basic computer and communication skills
  • Strong organizational and time management abilities
  • Ability to work independently or as part of a team
  • Adaptable and willing to learn new tools or systems

Benefits

  • Competitive salary with opportunities for increases
  • Flexible work hours and remote options (if applicable)
  • Opportunities for career growth and advancement
  • Ongoing training and development
  • Health, dental, and vision insurance (if applicable)
  • Paid time off and holiday benefits
  • Employee support programs and recognition

Take the next step in your career and apply today. W e are excited to learn more about you!

industries: Executive Search Services
companySlogan: Porque eres ÚNICO y tu forma de aprender también
companyDescription:
Eres único. Tu forma de aprender también.

En ES-PAT nos tomamos la educación muy en serio: nos gusta pensar que no somos un servicio más de profesores particulares. Creemos que cada persona es única, y que su forma de aprender también lo es. Por eso ofrecemos un servicio de educación particular hecho para ti.

Mantener la cercanía nos permite ofrecerte un servicio de confianza, combinado a la perfección con una absoluta seriedad en nuestros métodos y resultados. Te ofrecemos asesoramiento personalizado desde el primer momento y durante todo el tiempo que dure tu relación con ES-PAT.

Nuestros objetivos:
- Ofrecer una atención diferenciada adaptada a cada persona.
- Conseguir el aprendizaje a través de la motivación, no del estudio.
- Potenciar las habilidades de cada alumno y desarrollar sus áreas de mejora.
- Educar personas únicas y responsables.

El alumno está siempre en el centro de toda nuestra metodología.

Nuestros valores: 
- Confianza
- Cercanía
- Transparencia
- Integridad
- Excelencia

Nuestro sueño: que ES-PAT se convierta en un referente educativo, tanto del aprendizaje de español como de la enseñanza particular en general.

Nuestras líneas de negocio son:
- Enseñanza de español para extranjeros, profesionales expatriados y sus familias.
- Clases particulares de cualquier materia para niños, jóvenes y adultos.

title: Social Media Assistant
descriptionHtml:
This is a remote position.

FNEX is a global leader in private securities transactions and investment banking, specializing in private stock liquidity solutions for institutional investors. The firm provides institutional access and tailored liquidity solutions across a global network of leading private companies. With deep market expertise and a focus on innovation, FNEX facilitates efficient, secure, and strategic transactions in the private capital markets.

We are looking for a reliable and creative Social Media Assistant to help manage and grow our online presence. This is an entry-level, remote position perfect for someone who enjoys social media, has good communication skills, and pays attention to detail.


Key Responsibilities:


  • Create and schedule posts across social media platforms (Instagram, Facebook, TikTok, X, LinkedIn, etc.)

  • Engage with followers by liking, commenting, and responding to messages or questions

  • Help research trends, hashtags, and new content ideas

  • Monitor social media analytics and report on engagement and growth

  • Assist with creating captions, graphics, and short videos using tools like Canva or CapCut

  • Support the marketing team with general online tasks and promotions




Requirements





  • Basic understanding of major social media platforms

  • Good written communication and creativity

  • Ability to work independently and meet deadlines

  • Access to a smartphone, laptop, and reliable internet connection

  • Experience with tools like Canva, Buffer, or Hootsuite is a plus (but not required)




Benefits





  • 100% remote — work from anywhere

  • Flexible schedule

title: Auto Optimization Specialist I
descriptionHtml:
|Current Gannett Employees- Please ensure you are using our abbreviated process on the internal Careers site by logging into Dayforce through MyApps|

Gannett Co., Inc. (NYSE: GCI) is a diversified media company with expansive reach at the national and local level dedicated to empowering and enriching communities. We seek to inspire, inform, and connect audiences as a scalable, growth focused media and digital marketing solutions company. We endeavor to deliver essential content, marketing solutions, and experiences for curated audiences, advertisers, consumers, and stakeholders by leveraging our diverse teams and suite of products to enrich the local communities and businesses we serve. Our current portfolio of trusted media brands includes the USA TODAY NETWORK, comprised of the national publication, USA TODAY, and local media organizations in the United States, and Newsquest, a wholly-owned subsidiary operating in the United Kingdom. Our digital marketing solutions brand, LocaliQ, uses innovation and software to enable small and medium-sized businesses to grow, and USA TODAY NETWORK Ventures, our events division, creates impactful consumer engagements, promotions, and races. Gannett open roles are featured on various external job boards. When applying to a position at Gannett, you should be completing an application on Gannett Careers via Dayforce. Job postings directing you to complete an application on other external sites may not be valid. To connect with us, visit www.gannett.com

Auto Optimization Analyst I

$55,000 – $60,000 | Excellent Benefits | Collaborative, Growth-Focused Team

Are you ready to accelerate your digital marketing career? Join our high-performing, supportive team as an Auto Optimization Analyst I — where data, creativity, and collaboration drive results. In this role, you’ll be hands-on managing paid search campaigns (SEM) and optimizing organic search (SEO) for top automotive clients, helping them dominate the search landscape and convert more leads.

We’re looking for someone with a passion for performance marketing and a knack for turning insights into action. If you love the thrill of improving ROI, experimenting with strategy, and seeing your optimizations translate into real business growth — this is the opportunity for you.

What You’ll Do

  • Manage and optimize paid search (SEM) and SEO campaigns with a strong focus on the automotive industry
  • Monitor, analyze, and fine-tune campaigns to maximize traffic, leads, calls, and conversions
  • Collaborate closely with Account Management and Sales teams to develop performance-driven digital strategies
  • Track KPIs, identify trends, and adjust tactics in real time to boost performance
  • Troubleshoot and resolve campaign challenges creatively and efficiently
  • Stay ahead of evolving search trends, algorithms, and technologies

What You Bring

  • 1+ years of experience managing SEM campaigns (SEO experience a plus)
  • A strong grasp of paid search platforms, conversion tracking, and analytics tools
  • Data-driven mindset with solid Excel and reporting skills
  • Ability to communicate strategy clearly to non-technical partners
  • Highly organized, detail-oriented, and motivated to learn and grow
  • A collaborative spirit and a passion for helping clients succeed

Why You’ll Love Working Here

  • Competitive Pay: $55,000 – $60,000 annually
  • Fantastic Benefits: Comprehensive medical, dental, vision, and 401(k) with company match
  • Supportive Team Culture: You’ll join a collaborative, encouraging environment that celebrates innovation and shared success
  • Career Growth: Opportunities to advance, learn new tools, and make a real impact in the automotive digital marketing space
  • Flexibility & Balance: We value results and collaboration — not micromanagement

Ready to drive results and grow your career with a team that values your talent?

Apply today and help shape the future of automotive digital marketing!

Applicants who require such accommodation should contact Gannett Co., Inc.’s Recruitment Department at Recruit@gannett.com.

industries: Online Audio and Video Media
companyDescription:
Statesman Journal is the primary source of news and information for our community.

Since the first edition of the Statesman Journal's predecessors rolled off the press more than 150 years ago, our mission has remained the same: to be the mid-Willamette Valley's primary source for local news and advertising information. 

The Statesman Journal is the largest news-gathering organization in the mid-Willamette Valley, focused solely on keeping readers informed about the events and people in their communities. Plus, our local news Web site keeps you informed on breaking news as it happens, 24 hours a day.

Our company core values guide us in providing readers and advertisers the best products and services possible.
